name: Isaac Ruiz
body:
## Brackelope: Tournament Builder
`iOS` My baby. 128 player tournament manager for double elimination, single elimination and knockout formats. Over 100k downloads. [iTunes](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/brackelope-tournament-builder/id545185377?ls=1&mt=8)

And now for some select projects I've had the pleasure of working on over the last few years...

### 529 Garage
`iOS` Project 529. Bike registry/recovery + push notifications. [iTunes](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/529-garage/id849303554?ls=1&mt=8)

### xPlor
`iOS` Marriott Hotels. Evviva Games. Cocoas2D promotional video game. [iTunes](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/xplor-by-marriott/id646951347)

### Madfish Elements
`iOS` Mad Fish SEO. Detailed analytics for MFE customers. [iTunes](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mad-fish-elements/id579218817?mt=8)

### Sid the Science Kid
`AS3` PBS Kids. FableVision. Flash games, for kids! [Let's Fly!](http://pbskids.org/sid/letsfly.html) / [Red Light Green Light](http://pbskids.org/sid/redLightGreenLight.html) / [I Want to be a Scientist](http://pbskids.org/sid/scientist.html) / [Gabriella's Balancing Act](http://pbskids.org/sid/balancingact.html) / [Collection Jar](http://pbskids.org/sid/collectionjar.html) / [Mystery Lunchbox](http://pbskids.org/sid/mysterylunchbox.html) / [Say What?](http://pbskids.org/sid/saywhat.html)

### Party Beans Gift Customizer
`AS3` Upload images. Customize gifts. Whitelable-able. [Party Beans](http://www.partybeans.com/gift/)

### Dinosaur Train
`jQuery` PBS Kids. FableVision. Click here to learn about dinosaurs. [Zoo Tour](http://pbskids.org/dinosaurtrain/tour/zoo.html)

### Alden's and Julie's Ice Cream
`AS3` Moto Interactive. Ice cream. Animated. [Alden's Ice Cream](http://www.aldensicecream.com/) / [Julie's Organic Ice Cream](http://www.juliesorganic.com/)
